page.title: 13LEISURE TIME COVENTRY S.W.
page.content: Recreational activities are based in the home,speciallist centres or at a multi-purpose community centre or church hall. {A CHILDS'SPARE TIME. In my spare time I do things more at home like making things,watching television,reading and playing records The things I do out of the home are going to Brownies and going for walks. A boy goes to Cubs,rides his B.M.X. bike and plays with his dog. {ADULT SPARE TIME. Mum often knits.Dad reads the news everyday and does a lot of gardening. Many adults spend some of their time doing some form of exercise to keep themselves fit and healthy.There are special classes in various activities like flower arranging and Adult Education.
